thread.title: Boat maker Brunswick to spin off fitness equipment business

title: Boat maker Brunswick to spin off fitness equipment business
text: March 1, 2018 / 1:37 PM / in 5 minutes Boat maker Brunswick to spin off fitness equipment business Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 1 (Reuters) - Recreational products maker Brunswick Corp will spin off its fitness business into a publicly traded company, the company known for its marine boats and billiards tables said on Thursday. The deal is expected to be tax-free to Brunswick shareholders. Brunswickâ€™s fitness unit that makes home and commercial equipment had sales of $1 billion in 2017. (Reporting by Nivedita Balu in Bengaluru; Editing by Sai Sachin Ravikumar)
